attributes.action: Legalise AM And Single Sideband Radio On 27Mhz (CB) In The UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizens Band Radio Was Legalized In The UK In 1981 By The Then Tory Government, After All These Years, And With The Advancement In Technology, We The Undersigned Feel It Is Time Citizens Band Radio Was Legalized On All Modes Of Emission AM,FM And SSB, With The Advent Of Digital Television And Radio There Is Now Little To No Possibility Of Interference To Broadcast Or Emergency Services, Thank You For Reading This

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
